activities.title: Diploma - Digital Media & IT specializing in Computer Software Development
activities.location: Northern Alberta Institute of Technology - Edmonton, Alberta
activities.description: At NAIT, I enrolled in a variety of programs that focused on improving my technical skills, such as Front-End Web Development, Web Design Fundamentals, Advanced Web Concepts, Intermediate Application Development, Quality Assurance & Software Testing, and Systems Analysis & Design. I also took courses to develop my soft skills, such as Advanced Communication and Organizational Behavior. For my efforts, I was awarded an Exemplary Academic Achievement Award in the Digital Media & IT Program for the Winter 2020 Semester and made it on the Dean's Honor Roll twice (Fall 2020 & Fall 2021).

activities.title: Internship/Practicum Placement
activities.description: During my internship, I used Photoshop to adjust and print unique web designs that I sourced from the internet, following my supervisor's instructions. I also conducted research on the latest trends and best practices in web design and development and I presented my findings to my supervisor. Additionally, I helped ensure the smooth operation of the office by efficiently handling various tasks such as relaying messages and running errands.

activities.title: Diploma - Network & Database Management
activities.description: At CDI I learned how to design computer systems and build computers for corporate use. I also learned how to setup databases and work with complex networking equipment.
